Articles.Content:
I'd like if camera settings (both in terms of IVA/external camera, and Free/Chase/etc) to persist, perhaps with the ability to choose between globally per save or default + per ship settings.

Anyone interested in putting my idea forward?

I don't know if it will help, but Malah made me a little mod called QuickIVA when I wanted to do an all IVA career. It isn't the whole request here of course. Sadly the all IVA career still failed, even with RPM the IVA controls are just underdeveloped.
I know, I've used this mod for some time but I've just uninstalled it. It's good, but not enough. Thanks, anyway.
